column1: # Note: It have been not used iso.org to get the ISO alpha-2 code because
# is only available for internal use and non-commercial purposes.
# There are several territories or areas that are inlcuded in iso.org but
#   SOUTH GEORGIA AND THE SOUTH SANDWICH ISLANDS:GS
# They are uninhabited or there is no permanent population so
# Except Taiwan that is a special zone (but it's included in China).
# It only has been added data related to countries where it is necessary
# Country or area name : ISO Alpha-3 code : ISO Alpha-2 code :
#  Geographical region : Territory of : Primary subdivision
THE FORMER YUGOSLAV REPUBLIC OF MACEDONIA:MKD:MK:e.s::
UNITED KINGDOM OF GREAT BRITAIN AND NORTHERN IRELAND:GBR:GB:e.n::cy
